definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Liuzhi Coal Mine is one of the areas in South Chica where karst water harm is serious.
sentences.chinese: 六枝礦區是我國南方煤礦水害嚴重地區之一。

sentences.english: Libing employed a method of channeling and dividing the water to harness the Minjiang Rivers.
sentences.chinese: 他用導流和深挖的手段來消除了岷江的水害。

sentences.english: Many are built on stilts to keep them above any future high water.
sentences.chinese: 許多房屋都配有腳柱使它們免受未來水害的侵擾。

sentences.english: This paper shows the main type of the water disasters and its measures in Kailuan Mine.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了開灤礦區主要水害類型及防治對策。

sentences.english: Later records, Yu governance from the Minjiang water damage are the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 後人記載，禹治理水害是從岷江開始的。

sentences.english: The Heshan coalfield is typical karstic water filling deposit; water disaster is serious during coal mining.
sentences.chinese: 合山煤田是典型的岩溶充水礦牀，礦井開採水害嚴重。

sentences.english: Water harm is one of the five natural calamities in mines.
sentences.chinese: 水害是煤礦的五大自然災害之一。

sentences.english: So the study of drainage limestone water under coalbed NO. 10 floor was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 得出太灰水是10煤開採時礦井充水的重要水害。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a kind of real-time monitoring technology for mine water damage control and guarantees system.
sentences.chinese: 論述了礦井水害防治保障體系中的一種實時監測技術。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
intrusion/perimeter breach/(esp.) (of a person or a foreign object) to breach the perimeter surrounding railway tracks
